thread.title: Plane makes emergency landing after woman hits passenger
thread.title_full: Plane makes emergency landing after woman hits passenger

author: Melanie Eversley
title: Plane makes emergency landing after woman hits passenger
text:
Plane makes emergency landing after woman hits passenger MELANIE EVERSLEY Last updated 09:37, September 16 2015 JIM SAVIANO 
A female passenger was escorted off an American Airlines flight after becoming unruly 
A screaming woman was removed from an American Airlines flight from Miami to Chicago, her presence prompting an emergency landing in Indianapolis before the flight continued to its destination, a passenger told USA TODAY. 
American Airlines Flight 1284 departed Miami just a few minutes past its scheduled departure, according to online data, but about an hour from the flight's Chicago destination, the pilot got on the loudspeaker, passenger Jim Saviano of Los Angeles and Las Vegas told USA TODAY. 
The pilot "announced a cabin lockdown and (that he) needed everyone in their seats immediately and needed large male volunteers to restrain a passenger," said Saviano, a disc jockey who also goes by the name Savi. YOUTUBE/SCREENGRAB 
A screaming woman was removed from an American airlines flight after she was alleged to have hit a passenger and tried to kiss a flight attendant. 
A few minutes later, the plane "started descending faster than normal and then the captain announced we would be making a landing in Indianapolis," Saviano said.
